attributes.action: Make recycling compulsory for companies in the UK
attributes.additional_details:
A study in Nov 2018 found 
80% of companies don't have separate bins for recycling
96% don't use recycled paper
59% still use plastic cups at the water fountain
(Businesswaste.co.uk)
attributes.background:
Recycling in the home is now part and parcel of daily life but only 10% of UK businesses have some form of green policy! 
Call for the Government to make all companies active in the UK have recycling and a green action plan!!!
